title: Impact of corporate earnings reports on Weatherford International PLC stock's price movements

content.text: On May 5, 2021, Weatherford International PLC released its Q1 2021 earnings report. The company reported a net loss of $194 million for the quarter, which was wider than expected by analysts. As a result, the stock price of Weatherford International PLC plummeted by approximately 10% on the day of the earnings release.

On February 25, 2021, Weatherford International PLC announced its Q4 2020 earnings. The company reported a net loss of $111 million for the quarter, which was better than expected by analysts. This positive surprise led to a significant increase in the stock price of Weatherford International PLC, with a gain of about 15% on the day of the earnings release.

On October 30, 2020, Weatherford International PLC reported its Q3 2020 earnings. The company's revenue of $792 million exceeded analyst expectations, and the adjusted net loss of $37 million was lower than anticipated. This positive earnings report resulted in a notable surge in the stock price of Weatherford International PLC, which rose by approximately 12% on the day of the release.

On July 24, 2020, Weatherford International PLC announced its Q2 2020 earnings. The company reported total revenue of $783 million, which exceeded analysts' estimates. Additionally, the adjusted net loss of $197 million was smaller than anticipated. This favorable earnings report contributed to a significant increase in the stock price of Weatherford International PLC, with a gain of around 8% on the day of the earnings release.

On May 8, 2020, Weatherford International PLC released its Q1 2020 earnings report. The company's revenue of $1.24 billion slightly surpassed analyst expectations, but the adjusted net loss of $183 million was wider than anticipated. This mixed earnings report led to a relatively muted response in the stock price of Weatherford International PLC, with minimal changes observed.

news.headline: Weatherford Announces Third-Quarter 2023 Conference Call
news.summary: HOUSTON, Sept. 29, 2023 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Weatherford International plc (NASDAQ: WFRD) (“Weatherford” or the “Company”) will host a conference call on Wednesday, October 25, 2023 to discuss the Company’s results for the third quarter ended September 30, 2023. The conference call will begin at 10:00 a.m. Eastern Time (9:00 a.m. Central Time).
